trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: 시작 하는 트리거 동작을 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 하 고 해당 애니메이션 대상된 개체 및 속성을 배포 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard 동작으로 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>대상 속성에 애니메이션을 적용 하 고 시작 하려면.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard 시작 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>에 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>트리거되면 참조.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: 시작 하기는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>다른 이미 애니메이션이 적용 되는 속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>BeginStoryboard 속성 애니메이션을 처리할 방법을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 스토리 보드에 대화형으로 수 일시 중지, 제어 그렇지 않으면 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>있는 선언한 태그에서 대화형으로 설정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>해당 BeginStoryboard의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 제어할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 를 참조 하 여 제어를</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>BeginStoryboard의 지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 코드에서의 대화형 메서드를 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>제어 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>는 BeginStoryboard를 사용 하 여 적용 된.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우의 경우 처럼 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체는 BeginStoryboard에 대 한 이름을 부여 해야 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>를 대화형으로 제어할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: 이 스토리 보드에서 애니메이션 클록을 시작 하려면 적절 한 넘기기 동작을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##작성 HandoffBehavior 적용할 때 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>를 사용 하 여 속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>있으면 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>해당 속성을 이전에 연관 된 개체가 시스템 리소스를 소비한 계속 있으며 타이밍 시스템이 클록이를 자동으로 제거 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 많은 수의 시계를 사용 하 여 적용 하는 경우 성능 문제를 방지 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>를 완성 한 후 속성에서 구성 중인 clock를 제거 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 클록을 제거 하는 방법은 여러 가지가:-모든 clock 속성에서 제거을 사용 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>애니메이션된 된 개체의 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 매개 변수로 애니메이션 효과가 적용 되는 속성을 지정 하 고 `null` 를 두 번째입니다.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 모든 애니메이션 클록 속성에서 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -특정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>시계를 목록에서 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> 메서드</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> 호출을</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> 검색 하</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> 방법의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> 을 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> 제거 하려면

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 이 일반적으로 수행 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>클록에 대 한 이벤트 처리기.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 유일한 루트 클록을 제어할 수 있는 참고는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>자식 클록의 속성을 반환 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>이벤트 시계의 유효 기간을 무제한 인 경우 호출 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 사용자 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> 를 호출 하는 경우 결정 해야

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 이 주로 수명이 긴 개체에 애니메이션에 대 한 문제입니다.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 가비지 수집 된 경우 해당 clock도 연결이 끊어지고 가비지 수집.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 클록 개체에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [애니메이션 및 타이밍 시스템 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 지정 하 여는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 개체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 시작 된 후에 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지할 수를 다시 시작 하거나 대화형으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>의 Name 속성을 설정 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>같은 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>이 이름을 참조 하.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 경우 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>대화형으로 영향을 받지 않습니다; 시작한 후 또한 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>작업을 종료 하거나 애니메이션 클록 삭제 되도록 채우기 기간을 입력 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이름에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
